channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 11:52 The threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Cont attention, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 11:52 The threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Cont attention, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#Pokrovskaya_T territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
